snippet: A judge of the Los Angeles County Superior Court rejected a motion to lower the $10 million bail requirement that has been keeping Marion Knight in jail pending his trial for murder and attempted murder.
abstract: A judge of the Los Angeles County Superior Court rejected a motion to lower the $10 million bail requirement that has been keeping Marion Knight in jail pending his trial for murder and attempted murder.

headline.main: Suge Knight’s Motion to Reduce Bail Is Denied
headline.print_headline: Suge Knight Loses Bid For Reduced Bail
